 have you tried books by Stephen Turnbull on the Samurai? Try "samurai warlords the book of the daimyo".. also there is a wealth of info on the net on the samurai. theres one site to start with at www.angelfire.com/zine2/samuraiworld....
  bbux4evr <bbux4evr@...> wrote: Hi my name is Brian, and I'm trying to do a speech on the Samurai. I 
was wondering in anyone could e-mail me some information, maybe about 
the beginnings, how it was used, or how it may be used now. If you 
could help me out, that would be great.

My e-mail address:

bbux4evr@...

Thanks.

Brian
